name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James COLLINS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James COLLINS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM.
The order of the lower court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gilbert J. Scutti, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
438 A.2d 372
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James COLLINS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 30, 1981.
Gilbert J. Scutti, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
